name: Niord
body:
### Welcome to Niord - Nautical Information Directory
Editor and publication system for navigational warnings and notices to mariners (T&P).

### Projects
* [niord](https://github.com/NiordOrg/niord): Source code for the base Niord web application
* [niord-appsrv](https://github.com/NiordOrg/niord-appsrv): Scripts for installing and setting up Wildfly and Keycloak for Niord.
* [niord-dk](https://github.com/NiordOrg/niord-dk): Customised Danish Niord projects.

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/NiordOrg/niord/master/niord-web/src/main/webapp/img/niord_152.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
